extends java.lang.Object
    A class is used to create and execute a server process query to a database.

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveAuctions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getActiveAuctions(java.sql.Connection connection)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to get active auctions.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        Returns:
        A list of active auctions in a database. Empty list if active auctions doesn't exist in a database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.

      • completeAuctions

        public boolean completeAuctions(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                java.util.ArrayList<Auction> auctions)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to complete auctions. After that method setLoserParticipations() and setWinParticipations() must be used.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        auctions - - a list of auctions which will be completed in a database. Only the ID and the end time fields must be filled in.
        Returns:
        true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred with database or not all fields are filled in.

      • setLoserParticipations

        public boolean setLoserParticipations(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Auction> auctions)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to set users loser participations. Must be used after completeAuctions() method.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        auctions - - a list of auctions which participants will be set. Only the ID and the last bet user fields must be filled in.
        Returns:
        true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred with database or not all fields are filled in.

      • setWinParticipations

        public boolean setWinParticipations(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Auction> auctions)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to set users win participations. Must be used after completeAuctions() method.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        auctions - - a list of auctions which participants will be set. Only the ID and the last bet user fields must be filled in.
        Returns:
        true.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred with database or not all fields are filled in.
